hymn.title: Thou art worthy, Thou art worthy

layout.singingstanza: Thou art wor -- thy, Thou art wor -- thy, Thou art wor -- thy, O Lord. Thou art wor -- thy to re -- ceive glo -- ry, Glo -- ry and hon -- or and power. For Thou hast cre -- at -- ed, hast all things cre -- at -- ed, For Thou hast cre -- at -- ed all things. And for Thy plea -- sure they are cre -- at -- ed; Thou art wor -- thy, O Lord.

lyrics.stanza: Thou art worthy, Thou art worthy, Thou art worthy, O Lord. Thou art worthy to receive glory, Glory and honor and power. For Thou hast created, hast all things created, For Thou hast created all things. And for Thy pleasure they are created; Thou art worthy, O Lord.
